text: Anɨb agek, mɨnek ak Aglipa ayɨp nɨnay Benaysi ayɨp, chech teplep yɨbɨl lɨlek. Lɨl, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl ogɨnap ayɨp, bɨawl man anɨb ak nɨb ogɨnap ayɨp wɨlɨkɨl, binɨb awl apobun agɨl, kɨles tɨmel gɨlɨg, kot nɨgep kal mɨgan ak owlak. Ap mɨdɨlaknɨŋ, Pestus bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop agak, Amɨl Pol nop dad owɨm agak.
